Subclass/Dual Class Certificate Manager Trandon:
If your subclass is strong enough, that class' power can be transferred to your main class.
But this is a dangerous feat. Your power must be proven through certification.
If you have a certificate, I will do a partial transfer on you.
Now, will you learn the subclass skills transferred onto the main class?
[npc_%objectId%_subclass_CertificationSkillList|"Yup, I'll learn it."]
[npc_%objectId%_Chat 8|"I have to learn more stuff? No thanks..."]
